# Relative Frequency Function
## Computes the relative frequency of a given desired outcome.
### by Matthew Bachmann


```{r}
library("ggplot2")
```

```{r}

die <- function(size){
  die <- 1:size
  die
}

roll <- function(size){
 outcome = sample(die(size),1)
 outcome
}

roll(50)

```

```{r}
relative_frequency <- function(samples,size,f,desired) {
  outcomes <- replicate(samples,f(size))
  total_desired <- 0
  freq <- 0
  for(i in 1:samples){
    if(outcomes[i] == desired){
      total_desired <- total_desired +1
    }
    freq <- c(freq,total_desired/i*100)
  }
  qplot(0:samples,freq)
}

relative_frequency(5000,20,roll,2)
```
